Genre1.name: Action
Genre1.description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience…

Genre2.name: Thriller
Genre2.description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience…

Genre3.name: Drama
Genre3.description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They're plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward. Dramas follow a clearly defined narrative plot structure, portraying real-life scenarios or extreme situations with emotionally-driven characters.

Genre4.name: Comedy
Genre4.description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.
